price: When they came to him and said, “Peace.” He said, “Upon you be peace.” [saying to himself] “Unknown people!”
arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ
